HDC breached two support workers who verbally abused a young disabled woman https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-breached-two-support-workers-who-verbally-abused-a-young-disabled-woman/PZPZ6O5GNRHLPAR4D4VJKCC7MI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-breached-two-support-workers-who-verbally-abused-a-young-disabled-woman/PZPZ6O5GNRHLPAR4D4VJKCC7MI/ Tara ShaskeyShe wanted to keep her iPad and charger in her room.Mon, 15 Jul 2024 02:00:00 +0000 A young disabled woman was verbally abused by two support workers tasked to care for her.
